divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking from my house to the bus stop around 6:45 in the morning, and I was with my brother. I looked up because I had this gut feeling. When I looked up, I saw this giant bright orb, hovering above me, and I stare it it, and then it shoots away so fast, I can barely understand what just happened. It was a really bright orb. My step-dad is a huge believer of UFO's and aliens, and he has had a couple of experiences with them, and so I am also a total believer as well. But as soon as I saw that, I freaked out and got really excited, and told my brother, and he doesn't believe me but whatever. I told almost all the people at my bus stop, and they thought I was just messing, but I wasn't... And I lost sight of the object because it shot across the sky, and disappeared.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Paoli
There were no other sightings in Paoli on or around October 21st 2011
Summary: I was walking to the bus stop, and I looked up and saw this giant bright orb hovering, and then it shoots across the sky.
